questions.question_text:
A company with a small network team purchases 10 Cisco Nexus 9000 Series Switches for a network refresh. Some elements of the existing network infrastructure will be retained including DHCP and DNS servers. The company wants the network team to use PowerOn Auto Provisioning (POAP) to configure the switches, but the team only has experience with manual configuration.

Which two additional network infrastructure components must be configured to use POAP? (Choose two.)

discussion.content: A & D NETBOOT host discovery: This allows the switch to locate the TFTP server and obtain the configuration file.

Selected Answer: CD
C & D - correct.

Selected Answer: CD
SCP & of course TFTP seem the most likely answers - no reference to NETBOOT,GIT,SNMP from looking at cisco docs but SCP is a default protocol

Selected Answer: A
IOS router…. In NXOS has to be event cli match….

comments.content:
Correct A
event manager applet cli-match
event cli pattern "write mem.*" sync yes
action 1.0 syslog msg "$_cli_msg Command Executed"
set 2.0 _exit_status 1
https://www.cisco.com/c/en/us/td/docs/ios-xml/ios/eem/configuration/xe-3se/3650/eem-xe-3se-3650-book/eem-policy-cli.pdf

choices.B: event cli match "write memory.*" sync yes
choices.C: event cli regex "write memory.*" sync yes
choices.A: event cli pattern "write memory.*" sync yes
choices.D: event cli command "write memory.*" sync yes

discussion.content: TFTP is correct.If you want safe choose SCP, TCP insecurity Choose FTP

Selected Answer: B
tftp is the one

B is correct.
Only TFTP is the UDP based protocol. The other protocols are TCP.

B is correct
A = SFTP runs on TCP 22 (but can be assigned whatever port you want, but only TCP).
B = TFTP runs on UDP 69 = Is correct
C = SCP runs on TCP 22.
D = FTP runs on TCP 21 to establish connection and TCP 20 to transfer data.

questions.question_text: A network engineer must perform a backup and restore of the Cisco Nexus 5000 Series Switch configuration. The backup must be made to an external backup server. The only protocol permitted between the Cisco Nexus Series switch and the backup server is UDP. The backup must be used when the current working configuration of the switch gets corrupted. Which set of steps must be taken to meet these requirements?
questions.answer_description:
Of the answer choices given, only TFTP uses UDP. SFTP runs on TCP 22 (but can be assigned whatever port you want, but only TCP). TFTP runs on UDP port
69. SCP runs on TCP port 22.
FTP runs on TCP port 21 to establish connection and TCP 20 to transfer data.

choices.C: 1. Perform a running-config backup to an SCP server. 2. Copy running-config in the boot flash to the running-config file.
choices.A: 1. Perform a running-config backup to an SFTP server. 2. Copy backup-config from the SFTP server to the running-config file.
choices.B: 1. Perform a startup-config backup to a TFTP server. 2. Copy backup-config from the backup server to the running-config file.
choices.D: 1. Perform a startup-config backup to an FTP server. 2. Copy startup-config in the boot flash to the running-config file.

discussion.content:
Selected Answer: D
looks D is the correct one
